title: Destiny's Microtransaction System Has Some of Us Worried - IGN's Fireteam Chat
text: Previous DESTINY'S MICROTRANSACTION SYSTEM HAS SOME OF US WORRIED - IGN'S FIRETEAM CHAT â†’ 10 OCT 2015 The Eververse Trading Company is coming to Destiny bringing with it emotes that you can purchase for real money. This has at least one of us very worried. Don't have IGN Prime? Join Today! Get access to these videos: 416 x 234
